title: The power of people intelligence at your fingertip. A 360-degree view to billions of people with deep, actionable insights ðŸš€

sources.name: TheWebCo
sources.description:
ThewebCo's mission is to provide companies with the most insightful data on people.
The fusion of a revolutionary approach to data analysis allows our engine to glean insight from the web in order to fulfill a basic human need - getting to know people better. New leads are generated, prospects are qualified, trust is improved, and recruiting becomes much more professional.


Who is using our platform?

Salespeople - Generate qualified leads, get warm calling insights, acquire fresh data, and increase conversion rates.

Recruiters - Get a pool of high-quality candidates sourced using robust skills analysis and friendly insights to break the ice.

Senior Executives - Get an overview of your network and pre-meeting intelligence right to your inbox.

Fraud analysis - Gain more confidence and trust by using our database for identity verification and risk analysis.
